QuestData.Title: Black Rook Prison
QuestData.Description: I did not come this far to lose her in the final moments.$B$BMaiev must be in the cells beneath Black Rook Hold.$B$BI scouted above, and the entrance to the prison is guarded by a fearsome jailor.$B$BI will sneak past and take out the guards inside. Defeat Araxxas, take the keys, and then meet me within.
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill Araxxas and collect the Prison Keys.
QuestData.RewardText: Good, these keys should open any of the cells within the prison.
